Sentencas: Triple-conducting perovskites are the focus of extensive research and have emerged as high-performance cathode materials for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H-SOFCs).
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency

Sentencas: Notably, BaCe0.36Fe0.64O3-delta (BCF36) has recently garnered attention for its ability to provide suitable oxygen ion conductivity and proton conductivity, all through skillful composition tuning.
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency

Sentencas: Here, A-site deficient BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-delta (D-BCF30) is prepared to further boost the cathode activity.
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency

Sentencas: The composition content is modified by introducing Ba cation deficiency according to XRD and calculation results.
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency

Sentencas: Remarkably, the single cell equipped with D-BCF30 cathode demonstrates a significantly enhancement in performance, featuring a high power density of 1425 mW cm -2 and a low polarization resistance of 0.045 Omega cm2 at 700 degrees C compared to stoichiometric BCF30.
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency

Sentencas: Moreover, the cell operation durability has markedly improved which is further substantiated through experiments and density functional theory (DFT) calculations, suggesting a promising avenue to improve performance and stability of H-SOFCs.
Titulo: Balance the conductivity and enhance chemical stability of BaCe0.3Fe0.7O3-δ by tuning A-site cation deficiency
